references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, which is the foundation for the Faster Diffusion method explored in the paper.
This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models and provides the theoretical background for many of the improvements in diffusion models, including the ones studied in the paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides a fundamental framework for understanding and improving score-based generative models, which is crucial for enhancing diffusion models.
This paper introduces DDIM, a sampling method that significantly improves the speed of diffusion models and which is used as a baseline for comparison in this work.

references.paper_title: DPM-solver: A fast ode solver for diffusion probabilistic model sampling in around 10 steps
references.reason: This paper introduces DPM-Solver, another fast sampling method for diffusion models that serves as a key comparison point for the proposed approach.
